curl up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to move so that you are lying or sitting with your arms and legs bent close to your body
curl up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I just wanted to curl up and go to sleep.
Sarah was curled up on the sofa.
curl up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if something flat curls up, its edges start to become curved and point upwards
curl up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The letter was now yellow and beginning to curl up.
